BeIDConnect

General

BeIDConnect developed by BOSA provides browser extensions + a native app to enable BOSA DSS services for your Belgian eID card in a safe and user friendly way.

BeIDConnect is a universal binary and supported starting from MAC OS X 10.10 Yosemite

Installation

This installation will be installed for the current user only and you don't need admin rights to run this installer. BeIDConnect will be active directly after installation.

Smartcard readers

Support for some reader drivers can be found on following link: http://belgeid.be

Uninstall

This installation image also contains an uninstall pkg that removes BeIdConnect from your applications.
